The Christian doctrine: or, A short catechism Briefly shewing how to become a Christian: how to continue a Christian. Divided into ten heads, for the ease of memory. Approved by sundry elders of the baptized churches. J. S.
16 p.
printed for Francis Smith, at the Elephant and Castle in Cornhil, near the Royal-Exchange, London : 1678.
Preface signed: J.S. Identifed as Wing S36 on UMI microfilm "Early English books, 1641-1700.".
=======
